title: The fyfte eglog of Alexandre Barclay of the cytezen and vplondyshman. Here after foloweth the prologe.
author: Barclay, Alexander, 1475?-1552.
publisher: In flete strete, at the sygne of sonne, by Wynkyn de Worde,
notes: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
